TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, you have the power of cosmic radiation. Unfortunately, you are not immune to the effects of its use.

I wish I was immune to all kinds of radiation other than those inside the visible spectrum.

granted, now you are no longer imune to the radiation of the visible spectrum.

I wish I could code better

Granted, you can now only code something to display the word "better".

I wish I could code. Preferably, quite well.

granted, sadly though your new coding skills have made you a threat to the government so they have dispatched several blackwater mercs to your house right now...

i wish that i can make a good wish

Granted. BLACKWATER MUCKELS eat your home.

Hi! Bye. MURDER.

granted? but you are the one that gets murdered?

I wish I didn't like creepypasta

Granted, but creepypasta simply refuses to let go of you. It will hold you in its shadowy grip for ever and always, whether you like it or not.

I wish I wasn't such a terrible person.

Granted, but you go from being a terrible person to being a terrorist person.

I wish people would discuss deadlines with each other before setting them all for the same day.

granted, this results in confusion as people realize that they weren't all thinking the same thing which results in anarchy

i wish that my keyboard wasn't broken(missing an M key and the I keeps popping out)

granted, this results in confusion as people realize that they weren't all thinking the same thing which results in anarchy

i wish that my keyboard wasn't broken(missing an M key and the I keeps popping out)

Granted. You get a new keyboard, but the cable uses a test copy of non-backwards-compatible USB 4.0

I wish I could fly.

Granted. You are now a fruit fly.

I wish for lulz

Granted. You are crushed by several cubic kilometers of neutron star matter.

I wiush for tes. rae r

Granted. As for this wish being wished, you must actually make wishes in the future and not just sentences

I wish for me to explode in a fireball, killing the universe.

Granted. As for this wish being wished, you must actually make wishes in the future and not just sentences

I wish for me to explode in a fireball, killing the universe.

Granted. You are now on trial in an alternate universe for realiticide and several qintillion deaths. Luckily, that universe has a sentence limit of two years. Unluckily, they measure years by galactic rotation of the outer arms.

I wish the RAM I bought and paid for next day shipping last Thursday would finally get here.
Granted... but they mixed up your order. Enjoy your new Battering RAM (shame about the computer, though).

Granted... but they mixed up your order. Enjoy your new Battering RAM (shame about the computer, though).

I wish an asteroid crashes into earth

have fun corrupting a wish that is already corrupted...

Granted, However, the humans deflect the asteroid from Earth, and it doesn't hit it.

I wish for people to be less stupid

Granted, but since stupid people cannot do stupid things and your company can't make money because there are no stupid people to buy stupid things!

I wish for more corrupt wishes!

Granted, you wished for an asteroid; however, the asteroid crashes into the Earth as a result of the wish being corrupted. Another corrupt wish is that the Humans deflect the asteroid, and the asteroid impacts anyway.

I wish to DO THE MARIO!

Granted, but someone does the Luigi instead. You fall into a deep depression at this disappointment.

Son, I wish I was not disappoint.

Granted, but someone does the Luigi instead. You fall into a deep depression at this disappointment.

Son, I wish I was not disappoint.

Someone reappoints you. Multiple times. With a shiv. Your physical therapy will take years and you will never walk again.

I wish politics were banned.

Granted. They give it a fancy new name and continue to destroy the world, piece by piece.

I wish I had motivation.

Granted. You are motivated to do nothing.

I wish for more time to play.

Granted, you can now have all the time in the world to play with Barbie.

I wish that the next poster gets a cookie.

Granted. I sold your house to get me the cookie because I forgot to bring my wallet with me

I wish I could retire >:-[
